# Data
```{r}
df <- readRDS("./data/dataset/df.RDS")
```

## Figure Code
```{r,message=F,error=F,warning=F,fig.width=15,fig.height=7.5}
x_log_breaks <- c(-2,-1,0,1,2,3,4,5)
MIC_x_scale <- scale_x_continuous(breaks=x_log_breaks, labels=c("≤0.25","0.5", "1","2","4","8","16","≥32"))

# Figure
figure1A <- create_MIC_histogram(df$MVB_log_2,df$MVB_cat,"Meropenem-Vaborbactam") + MIC_x_scale + ylim(NA,250) + figure_1_format + resistance_cat_scale
  
figure1B <-  create_MIC_histogram(df$IR_log_2,df$IR_cat,"Imipenem-Relebactam")+ MIC_x_scale + ylim(NA,250) + figure_1_format + resistance_cat_scale

# Legend
MIC_legend <- get_legend(figure1A)
MIC_legend_plot <- plot_grid(MIC_legend) + theme(plot.margin = unit(c(t=-0.25, 0, 0, b=0), "cm"))

# Create cowplot Figure
MIC_histograms <- plot_grid(figure1A + theme(legend.position = "none"),figure1B + theme(legend.position = "none"), ncol = 2, labels = "AUTO", label_size = 24)
figure1 <- plot_grid(MIC_histograms,MIC_legend_plot, ncol=1,rel_heights = c(1,0.125)) 
```
